list-channels.doc: List all available channels for installation.

update-channels.doc: List all installed packages in all channels.

channel-delete.summary: Remove a Channel From the List
channel-delete.doc: <channel name> Delete a channel from the registry. You may not remove any channel that has installed packages.

channel-add.doc: <channel.xml> Add a private channel to the channel list. Note that all public channels should be synced using "update-channels". Parameter may be either a local file or remote URL to a channel.xml.

force.doc: will force download of new channel.xml if an existing channel name is used

channel.doc: will force download of new channel.xml if an existing channel name is used

channel-update.doc: [<channel.xml>|<channel name>] Update a channel in the channel list directly. Note that all public channels can be synced using "update-channels". Parameter may be a local or remote channel.xml, or the name of an existing channel.

channel-info.doc: <package> List the files in an installed package.

channel-alias.summary: Specify an alias to a channel name
channel-alias.doc: <channel> <alias> Specify a specific alias to use for a channel name. The alias may not be an existing channel name or alias.

channel-discover.summary: Initialize a Channel from its server
channel-discover.doc: [<channel.xml>|<channel name>] Initialize a Channel from its server and create the local channel.xml.
